title: Data Analyst
description: Analyze and interpret complex datasets to help drive informed business decisions.
requirements: Bachelor's degree in Data Science, Statistics, or related field
Experience with data visualization tools such as Tableau or Power BI

title: Data Engineer
description: Develop and maintain robust data pipelines for large-scale data processing and analytics.
requirements: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or a related field
Proficiency in Python, Java, or Scala
Experience with ETL processes and big data technologies (Hadoop, Spark)
Familiarity with cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, or Google Cloud)

title: Data Scientist
description: Utilize advanced statistical methods and machine learning techniques to extract insights and build predictive models.
requirements: Master's degree in Data Science, Machine Learning, or related field
Strong programming skills in Python or R
Experience with machine learning frameworks (TensorFlow, PyTorch)
Ability to communicate complex ideas effectively
